name: Sea of Lies: Nemesis HD - A Hidden Object Detective Adventure
name_original: Sea of Lies: Nemesis HD - A Hidden Object Detective Adventure
description:
Play the trial for FREE! Pay once & complete the adventure!

Authorities are baffled by a series of unexplained deaths, and you’ve been asked to investigate. Can you find out how these men died, how they’re all connected, and most importantly, who killed them?

• A NAUTICAL MURDER MYSTERY
As Senorita Addams, famous lady detective, you are called upon by the Governor himself to investigate a suspicious death.

• WHO WANTED THIS PROMINENT CITIZEN DEAD?
The authorities have ruled the death by "natural causes", but the victim's friend believes that the paranoia the deceased exhibited before he died might point to a more sinister truth.

• THIS MURDERER’S CALLING CARD IS YOUR NEMESIS
Use a forensics kit to examine murder scenes and look for clues. Search for useful items within hidden object scenes and solve challenging mini-games and puzzles!

• UNCOVER MORE SECRETS IN THE BONUS GAME!
Search for buried treasure in every scene! Then enjoy the bonus gallery with features stunningly drawn wallpapers and intriguing concept art.
